professional.title: Professionalism
professional.description: We offer you a complete and personalized service from the beginning to the end of the sales process

fast.title: Speed
fast.description: We have a powerful database shared between our offices and more than 30 advisers working to sell your home.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: After more than 10 years working in Alicante, our team knows the local real estate market perfectly

houseValue.title: Know the value of your property
houseValue.subtitle: Free home appraisal service
houseValue.description:
Thanks to our extensive experience in the local real estate market, we know the real sales prices of each neighborhood.

In addition, we have the most advanced software in real estate management, which allows us to propose the right price to sell your home.

All of this without obligation and completely free of charge.

idealBuyer.title: We find the ideal buyer
idealBuyer.subtitle: Fully personalized marketing plan
idealBuyer.description:
We have virtual reality cameras. This way users will visit your property like never before.

We will also promote your property in our offices as well as in our monthly magazine to give it maximum visibility.

We carry out an analysis of all the possible buyers profiles to find the ones that best suit your interests.

adjustNeeds.title: We adjust to your needs
adjustNeeds.subtitle: Integral management, from start to finish
adjustNeeds.description:
We do a photographic report (2D and 3D) and we take care of the release of the ads on all the media, both online and offline.

We take care of all the documentation procedures and accompany you to the notary at the time of signing.

During the entire process, if you have any questions, you just have to pick up the phone and our advisors will be happy to assist you.

aboutUs.title: About us | Inmobiliaria Núcleo
aboutUs.description: Real estate in Alicante with more than 10 years of experience. We help you to sell your property or to find the best houses for sale in Alicante
aboutUs.section-1-text:
Inmobiliaria Núcleo is a network of real estate agencies in Alicante with more than 10 years of experience in the sector.

Currently, Núcleo has 5 offices spread throughout the geography of the province of Alicante.

Our team has that young spirit with grace and initiative at the forefront of technology and at the same time has great training and experience in the real estate market.
aboutUs.section-2-text:
Formed by professionals from the real estate and technology sectors who have more than 10 years of experience. Our strategic point of view has always been oriented towards evolution and growth, towards the continuous adaptation that technology offers us.

Over time, we have left behind the traditional vision that we consider to be stagnant of real estate services, to focus on progressing and looking to the future.
aboutUs.section-3-text:
Honesty, integrity and professionalism are the three words that have characterized us throughout our journey. Our future projection has an evolutionary sense. We maintain our essence and personality, while we adapt pro-actively to the needs of the market.

To achieve our objectives, we surround ourselves with the best professionals in the different fields of interest that our clients need. This way, we offer the best solutions and complete advice, from start to finish, for those who trust.
